posts.post_content:

Feel free to inquire about images at [url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]

Burdick: nice card with a clear image  PRICE: $200
Visner: nice card with a clear image PRICE: $150
Blair: Hamiltons (tougher team), clear image  PRICE $275
Leighton: great pose PRICE: $150
John Shaw: really tough Minneapolis player PRICE: $300
Duke Farrell: SGC 10, nice image  SOLD
Canavan: SGC 20, nice image, pinkish tint PRICE: $150
Foreman: SGC 10, popular team (Baltimore) Price: 100

More rough cards
Wilmot: nice image, but rebacked  PRICE $60
Kenyon: catcher pose, but light image PRICE $30
Rehse: tougher team (Minneapolis), trimmed and skinned, SUPERB image PRICE $50
Gerhardt: skinned and trimmed, SCRIPT SERIES CARD PRICE $80
Bligh: trimmed and skinned, but a nice clear image PRICE 30
Fuller: rebacked and light image  PRICE 30
O'Brien: SGC A, skinned, but nice image on an outdoor pose PRICE 80

Added prices! Please make any offer

will discount multiple card purchases

all the best,
barry
